overview: Hilarious story about quarrel stirred up among workmates of beauty salon "Goddess" - madam Juno, Lyuba and Diana. Which one of them is worthy of the gift with inscription «to the fairest», brought by secret admirer? Misunderstanding between women quickly turns into a fight. Each of them desires a gift from secret admirer. Final judgment is given to the guard called Pasha.
title: The Apple of Discord
